title: Testing
description: How to test your Nuxt application.

children.value: If you are a module author, you can find more specific information in the
Nuxt offers first-class support for end-to-end and unit testing of your Nuxt application via
, a library of test utilities and configuration that currently powers the
tests we use on Nuxt itself
and tests throughout the module ecosystem.

This means you should take particular care not to mutate the global state in your tests (or, if you need to, to reset it afterwards).

to set up the Nuxt test environment correctly.
Please use the options below for the
: Path to a directory with a Nuxt app to be put under test.
: The amount of time (in milliseconds) to allow for
to complete its work (which could include building or generating files for a Nuxt application, depending on the options that are passed).
: Whether to launch a server to respond to requests in the test suite.
: If provided, set the launched test server port to the value.
: Whether to run a separate build step.
: Under the hood, Nuxt test utils uses
to carry out browser testing. If this option is set, a browser will be launched and can be controlled in the subsequent test suite.

of options that will be passed to playwright when launching the browser. See
